instructions.welcome: Welcome back! We would like to see if you can remember any of the sequences you practiced some months ago
instructions.phase_a: Try to play the sequence that goes with this pattern. Don’t worry if you make mistakes! There will be a re-start button available if you wish to start again.
instructions.phase_b: Let’s do this again but this time you get feedback on your mistakes after playing the sequence.
instructions.phase_c: Now if you make a mistake you will need to start from the beginning. However the correct keys will be highlighted where you made the mistake to help you.
instructions.phase_c2: Now you will learn a new sequence. Use the feedback to memorise it.

eeg.phase_a: Try to play the sequence that goes with this pattern. Don’t worry if you make mistakes!
eeg.phase_b: Well done! Now your task is to play the same sequence you have been playing, but now you have to skip one of the moves. You will be told which step to to skip; a complete and correct sequence will be composed by 5 move, instead of 6. Please keep playing it as fast as you can
eeg.phase_c: Your task now is to create new sequences with 6 steps like the ones you have practiced at home. Try to make up as many differnet sequences as you can, as quickly as possible. Don't worry if you repeat yourself now and again. Good luck!

configuration.bad_seed: Seed must be an integer value!
configuration.set_seed: Set User Seed to %{seed}. This controlls the symbols and melodies the user will see
configuration.set_user: Set User ID to %{userid}. All data will logged against this id
